title: OPL Grand Final is on tonight!

replies.body:
Hey Riot, I am unable to attend the OPL Finals during the day and was wondering if there was any chance to get the show bag at Hoyt's Cinema Warringah Mall sometime during the event despite being not able to attend the actual viewing party. I Would be more than happy to pay for the bag, how much would it cost?

I am an avid League of Legends player and it would mean heaps to me if you guys could sell me a bag at the door. I wont bee able to meet at Hoyt's Cinema Warringah Mall until approximately 6:10 PM. Im fine waiting around until the current game has finished, could I come and ask the Staff? 

Thanks Heaps, TRIPIN.
Hopefully Braum's burgers wont be too overpriced....

Very excited for this event in Sydney today.

My friends and I bought tickets and are about to head off to Luna Park to enjoy some rides before the (hopefully!) five, amazing games.

Thanks a bunch to whoever is responsible!!!!
I was going to go, then i fell on a grate yesterday and have 5 stitches in my knee
giant {{champion:17}}, giant {{champion:17}} !! lol, i totally died when I saw it. :D :3
Not many comments ._. Do people have low expectations cause it's at Luna Park or because it's in Australia?
DO U WANT TO BLOODY PUT IT IN MELBOURNE{{item:3070}}
Bloody make the event in Melbourne. It's better
